body: what a waste of talent from this artist.

we need some continuation and have MC realize his a rebound lmao

I hope you continue this series. It would be nice to know what happened in between him becoming a doctor and when we last saw them together.

Well, she just used him a replacement so it's not impossible for him to make a replacement for her as well.
damn ok
This author always makes the stories too real for me. I've had enough shit in my relationships already. Another bittersweet psychological thriller

its sad how this author does great art but sad stories. probably the only thing that comes close to happy end is the co worker who got preganant and will keep the baby . This story. The FMC just found a replacement for her sensei that groomed her in high school. he fell for her but realized he couldnt make her fall for him still ended up a doctor married her but ended up continuing the cycle by having a side nurse.
Bittersweet but hot

this is pretty fucked up, especially the part where she buys him glasses to wear. i’m happy though that it’s kept vague if the teacher was his father or not and that they kept her issues realistic, this is some shit a woman would do. good story.
lol. he's just a replacement for her. now he should do his real student and leave her.
Sensei is a fuckimg slut but the sex is good tho
This shit is not that hard to understand, I'm surprised how many of you are trying to wrap your pea brains around it kek.
I don't think the mc got married to Sensei. And the ending shows how a fuck boy/girl can change someone entirely.
its april 1 and its 00:01 of 2022 here. can anyone make 177013 popular and on 2nd april announce that it was an april fool joke?

so his dad groomed her, she became a masochist. then she meets her teacher's son and grooms him so she can relive the memories with her teacher. then he cheats on her in the end. not bad for a twisted plot but not bad at all

That's some Kuzu no Honkai level of shits. So they married to each other in the end? Poor MC

So a vanilla guy that loves a perverted masochist and ends up marrying her... wow, so weird, idk why but I had a good time reading the whole thing and love it, even though that is not what I would want for a story like this. Art is really nice, mostly consistent. Very good indeed.
Love it

Oh I see, Looks like the female sensei is only using the MC for her fantasy since he looks quite a bit as his old sensei that once mated with her now she can't forget the feeling and now using the MC to be the sensei-to-be something like that, Idk seems like a bitch move to me and this is just my own speculations.
